column5: Just recently bought 2 new rods with fixed reel seats but unhappy with the position they are set at. Is it still possible to reposition the reel seat or am I stuck with where they are at.
It's possible but it takes time and if you take it to a builder a bit of $$$$. The handle will need to be stripped off and replaced completely.
That's good to hear. Any rod builders in here want a job?
Is it not possible to return them?
A little too late now but I really like the rods
Well then it would seem you have the above option Drifter posted or living with them as is.  Are you anywhere near Hamilton?
Yes I am about a half hour away
There you go Spiel. You owe me a 10% finders fee!!!!      :tease:
Gee thanks Dave, we'll call it even on the cork deal.     Well if you want to come by for an assessment on the required work shoot me a PM.
You got me working for nickels and dimes now Rob.
